EmailTemplate.description: Notification to follow up for Interview Feedback
EmailTemplate.name: Interview Feedback Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Interview Feedback Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Interview__c.Account_Manager__c}, Your interview for {!Interview__c.Contact_Candidate__c} took place today at {!Interview__c.Start_Date__c} at {!Interview__c.Account_X__c} with {!Interview__c.Hiring_Manager__c} for the {!Interview__c.Job_Name__c}.Â Please follow up and update the interview status. Good luck and have a great day!
